home.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Bonifatus
home.faqTeaser: Have questions? Browse our comprehensive FAQ
home.faqNoResults: No questions match your search. Try different keywords.
home.faq1A: Bonifatus is a free platform that helps families turn academic grades into structured bonus rewards. Parents and children create accounts, link them together, and use the smart calculator to convert grades from any grading system into bonus points. Parents then choose how to settle those points — as cash, gift vouchers, savings deposits, or even ETF investments.
home.faq2Q: How does the bonus calculator work?
home.faq2A: Enter your grading system, class level, and term type, then add subjects and grades. The calculator normalizes each grade to a 0–100 scale, assigns a tier (best, good, fair, below), and multiplies by configurable class level and term type factors. The result is a transparent bonus point total that both parents and children can understand.
home.faq3A: Bonifatus supports grading systems from around the world including German 1–6, Swiss 1–6, Austrian 1–5, American A–F, British GCSE 9–1, French 0–20, percentage-based systems, and many more. Each system is accurately mapped to a normalized scale for fair bonus calculation.
home.faq4A: A parent generates a 6-digit invite code or QR code from their dashboard. The child enters this code on their profile page. Once linked, the parent can view the child's saved grades, settle rewards, and customize bonus factors. Either party can remove the connection at any time.
home.faq5A: Bonus points use the formula: class level factor × term type factor × grade tier factor × subject weight. Grade tiers are: Best (≥75%), Good (50–74%), Fair (25–49%), Below (<25%). Parents can customize all factors from Settings. Final terms and higher class levels typically earn more points.
home.faq6Q: What are the reward settlement options?
home.faq6A: Five options: Cash or pocket money (in person), Bank transfer (to the child's account), Gift vouchers (Amazon, Apple, Steam, Netflix, and more), Savings account (junior deposit), and Investment/ETF (long-term compound growth). Parents can even split a single payout across multiple methods.
home.faq7A: Yes! Bonifatus is completely free for all core features including the calculator, grade saving, parent-child connections, insights, and reward settlements. A Pro tier with advanced features is planned for the future.
home.faq8Q: How do I create an account?
home.faq8A: Click Sign Up, choose your role (parent or student), fill in your details, and verify your email with a 6-digit code. You will be automatically logged in after verification. Children must be at least 5 years old to register.
home.faq9A: Yes. Passwords are hashed with bcrypt, sessions use encrypted JWT tokens, and all data is stored on servers in Germany. We use Cloudflare Turnstile for bot protection and TLS encryption for all connections. We never sell your data and comply with GDPR.
home.faq10Q: Can I use Bonifatus on my phone?
home.faq10A: Absolutely! Bonifatus is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that works on any device — phone, tablet, or desktop. You can install it on your home screen for an app-like experience with offline capability.
home.faq11Q: How does the report card scanner work?
home.faq11A: Upload or photograph a report card, and our OCR engine extracts subjects and grades automatically. Review and correct any mismatches, then save directly to your profile. Currently supports German and English report cards.
home.faq12A: Bonifatus is available in 6 languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, and Russian. You can switch languages anytime from the navigation menu.
home.faq13Q: How do I customize bonus factors?
home.faq13A: Parents can customize factors in Settings under Bonus Calculation. Adjust grade tier values, term type multipliers, and class level factors — per child or as defaults for all children. Students see a read-only view of their parent's settings.
home.faq14A: The investment simulator helps parents visualize how regularly investing bonus rewards could grow over time. Choose between a savings plan with compound interest or an ETF simulation using historical market data to see projected portfolio growth.
home.faq15Q: Can I delete my account and data?
home.faq15A: Yes. Go to Profile, scroll to Danger Zone, and click Delete account. This permanently removes your account and all associated data including grades, connections, and settlements. This action cannot be undone.
home.faq16A: Quick grades let students log individual test scores as they come in, without creating a full term report. Parents can see unsettled quick grades and settle them in the Rewards section. Great for ongoing tracking between report cards.
home.faq17Q: What is the difference between term types?
home.faq17A: Midterm and Quarterly are intermediate assessments with a 0.5× bonus multiplier. Semester and Final are end-of-period assessments with a full 1× multiplier. Higher multipliers mean more bonus points for the same grades.
home.faq18Q: How do I reset my password?
home.faq18A: Click Forgot password on the login page, enter your email, and you will receive a 6-digit reset code. Enter the code along with a new password that is at least 12 characters with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and a special character.
home.faq19Q: Can multiple parents connect to one child?
home.faq19A: Yes! A child can be connected to multiple parents, and each parent can have multiple children connected. Each parent can customize their own bonus factors independently for each child.
home.faq20A: Yes. Bonifatus is operated from Germany and fully complies with the EU General Data Protection Regulation. Your data is stored on German servers, we only collect what is necessary for the service, and you have full rights to access, correct, export, and delete your data at any time.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introDesc: Bonifatus ("we", "us", "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our platform at bonifatus.com.
privacy.controllerDesc: The data controller for your personal information is the Bonifatus team, based in Germany. For any privacy inquiries, contact us at privacy@bonifatus.com.
privacy.collectDesc: We collect only the data necessary to provide our service:
privacy.collectL1: Account information: Full name, email address, date of birth, and user role (parent or student)
privacy.collectL2: Authentication data: Password hash (bcrypt-encrypted), email verification status, and session tokens
privacy.collectL3: Grade data: Subjects, grades, class levels, school years, term types, and calculated bonus points
privacy.collectL4: Connection data: Parent-child relationship records and invitation codes
privacy.collectL5: Security logs: Login attempts, IP addresses, and user agents for fraud prevention
privacy.collectL6: Preferences: Language, theme, notification settings, and cookie consent
privacy.useDesc: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
privacy.useL1: Providing the bonus calculator, grade tracking, and reward settlement services
privacy.useL2: Authenticating your identity and maintaining secure sessions
privacy.useL3: Sending transactional emails (verification codes, password resets, welcome messages)
privacy.useL4: Generating insights and analytics visible only to you and your connected family members
privacy.useL5: Detecting and preventing fraudulent or abusive activity
privacy.basisDesc: Under GDPR, we process your data on the following legal bases:
privacy.basisL1: Contract: Processing necessary to provide the Bonifatus service you signed up for
privacy.basisL2: Consent: Email communications and optional features you explicitly opt into
privacy.basisL3: Legitimate interest: Security logging, fraud prevention, and service improvement
privacy.storageL1: All data is stored on Hetzner servers located in Germany, subject to German and EU data protection law
privacy.storageL2: Passwords are hashed using bcrypt and never stored in plain text
privacy.storageL3: All connections use TLS/SSL encryption. Sessions are managed via encrypted JWT tokens
privacy.thirdPartyDesc: We use a limited number of third-party services to operate Bonifatus:
privacy.thirdPartyL1: Cloudflare Turnstile: Bot protection during login and registration. Cloudflare may process your IP address. See Cloudflare's privacy policy.
privacy.thirdPartyL2: Netcup SMTP: Email delivery for verification codes and notifications. Your email address is transmitted to send messages.
privacy.thirdPartyL3: Financial Modeling Prep API: Optional stock market data for the investment simulator. No personal data is shared with this service.
privacy.cookiesDesc: Bonifatus uses only essential cookies required for the application to function. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies. For full details, see our Cookie Policy.
privacy.childrenDesc: Bonifatus is designed for families and supports users aged 5 and older:
privacy.childrenL1: Children's accounts are linked to and supervised by parent accounts
privacy.childrenL2: We do not knowingly collect data from children under 5 years of age
privacy.childrenL3: Parents have full visibility into their connected children's data and can request deletion at any time
privacy.rightsDesc: Under GDPR and applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:
privacy.rightsL1: Access: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you
privacy.rightsL2: Rectification: Correct any inaccurate personal data
privacy.rightsL3: Erasure: Request deletion of your account and all associated data
privacy.rightsL4: Restriction: Request that we limit processing of your data
privacy.rightsL5: Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
privacy.rightsL6: Objection: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
privacy.rightsL7: Withdrawal: Withdraw consent for any consent-based processing at any time
privacy.rightsL8: Complaint: Lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority
privacy.retentionDesc: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. When you delete your account, all personal data is permanently removed. Security logs are retained for up to 90 days for fraud prevention purposes.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify registered users of material changes via email. The "Last Updated" date at the top reflects the most recent revision.
privacy.contactDesc: For privacy inquiries, data access requests, or to exercise any of your rights, contact us at:

about.title: About Bonifatus
about.heroDesc: We believe every child deserves to be recognized for their academic effort — and every family deserves a transparent, fair system to reward it.
about.missionDesc: Bonifatus was created to bridge the gap between academic achievement and meaningful rewards. Too often, grades remain abstract numbers. We turn them into something tangible — bonus points that parents can settle as pocket money, savings, or even long-term investments. Our mission is to motivate children, involve parents, and build healthy financial habits from an early age.
about.what1Desc: Convert grades from any grading system worldwide into transparent bonus points with customizable factors.
about.what2Desc: Link parent and child accounts securely. Parents see grades, settle rewards, and customize calculation factors.
about.what3Desc: Settle bonus points as cash, bank transfers, gift vouchers, savings deposits, or ETF investments.
about.what4Desc: Visual analytics, progress tracking, and year-over-year comparisons to celebrate improvement.
about.value1Desc: Children and parents see exactly how grades translate into rewards. No hidden formulas.
about.value2Desc: Data stored in Germany, GDPR compliant, no tracking cookies, no data sales. Your family's data is yours.
about.value3Desc: Free for all families, available in 6 languages, works on any device as a Progressive Web App.
about.value4Desc: Teaching children the value of their achievements through savings and investment simulations.
about.basedInDesc: Bonifatus is developed and operated by a dedicated team in Germany. Our servers are hosted by Hetzner in Germany, ensuring your data is protected under strict European data protection laws.
